days.title: Content + Lead Magnet Setup
tasks: Create downloadable guide for real estate financing
Set up landing page with email capture
Configure tracking links and email automation

days.title: Authority Content Launch
tasks: Publish long-form post on real estate funding strategies
Create 3 short-form videos for TikTok/Reels
Share lead magnet across all platforms

days.title: Paid + Organic Strategy
tasks: Launch small ad campaign ($50) to lead magnet
Post daily value content on Instagram/LinkedIn
Engage with real estate investor content

days.title: Email Nurture Sequence
tasks: Send first email to lead magnet subscribers
Share case study of successful real estate deal
Include soft CTA with tracking link

days.title: Community Leadership
tasks: Host live Q&A on funding options
Share insights in real estate investor groups
Create poll to engage audience

days.title: Scale & Optimize
tasks: Analyze best-performing content and replicate
Increase ad budget on winning campaigns
Send email #2 with stronger CTA

days.title: Performance Review
tasks: Review lead magnet downloads and conversions
Calculate ROI on ad spend
Plan content calendar for next 30 days
